info.name: Obsrv API Service
info.description: Obsrv is a set of APIs that provide access to a variety of data sources and datasets. These APIs can be used to analyze different types of events, as well as to manage data sources and datasets.

item.name: Dataset CRUD APIs

request.description: This API allows you to create new datasets used by the analytical data source.

response.name: Failure: Dataset with given dataset_id already exists
Failure: Dataset contains duplicate denorm out field

request.description: This API allows you to update existing datasets, add or remove denorm fields used by the analytical data source. User can even add, remove or update transformations

response.name: Failure: Dataset does not exists to update
Failure: No field provided along with dataset_id
Failure: Cannot update as dataset not in draft state
Failure:  Dataset contains duplicate denorm out field
Failure: Dataset tags to add already exists
Failure: Dataset tags to remove do not exist
Failure: Dataset transformations to add already exists
Failure: Dataset transformations to update do not exists
Failure: Dataset transformations to remove do not exist
Failure: Dataset denorm fields to add already exists
Failure: Dataset denorm to remove does not exist

request.description:
This API allows you to read dataset from the requested dataset_id. User can request for the specific fields and status of the dataset through the request params. By default, the API returns the dataset of status "Live".  
  
Valid fields that user can request are "dataset_id,id,name,type,validation_config,extraction_config,dedup_config,data_schema,router_config,denorm_config,transformation_config,dataset_config,tags,status,version,created_by,updated_by,created_date,updated_date,published_date"

response.name: Read Draft dataset
Read Live dataset
Read specific fields from the dataset
Failure: Invalid field name provided
Failure: Dataset not found

request.description: This API allows you to list all datasets. User can apply filters on dataset status and type, sort the datasets as per requested order.

response.name: Dataset list success when no filters provided
Dataset list success when status filter provided as array
Dataset list success when status filter provided as string
Dataset list success when type filter provided
Dataset list success based on sortBy values

item.description: The Dataset APIs facilitate efficient management of datasets by enabling users to create, read, and update dataset records, along with the capability to list multiple records based on specific criteria.

response.name: SQL Failure: Invalid date range
SQL Failure: dataset not found in druid
SQL Failure: Datasource not found in live table
Failure: Datasource not found in live table (native)
Failure: Invalid date range (native)
Failure: Dataset not found in druid
